Corinne Mitchell (1914-1993) bụ onye America na-ese ihe na onye nkuzi
Ọ bụ onye Africa America mbụ nwere ihe ngosi onwe ya na National Museum of Women in the Arts.

A mụrụ Mitchell née Howard na Machị 10, 1914, na Baskerville, Virginia, nké iri na otu n'ime ụmụ iri na asatọ. Ọ gàrà St Paul's College na-enweta akara ugo mmụta na 1935, Virginia State College na- nwetara B.A na 1951, na Mahadum George Washington na-enweta MA na 1965.
Di na nwunye ahụ nọ na Washington, D.C

Mitchell gàrà n'ihu na-akụzi na Montgomery County Schools ruo n'afọ 1982.Site n'ọrụ ikike ọbọdọ ya, Mitchell matara ndị na-ese ihe na mpaghara Washington Loïs Mailou Jones, Delilah Pierce, na Alma Thomas.

N'afọ 1992, National Museum of Women in the Arts mèrè ihe ngosi Glimpse of Joy, nke bụ ihe ngosi mbụ nke NMWA nke nka nwanyị Africa America. N'afọ 1993, ụlọ akwụkwọ Charles Sumner mèrè ihe ngosi nkè ihe osise ya iri abụọ na itoolu. Ọrụ ya dị na The Johnson Collection, Spartanburg, South Carolina.
Mitchell nwụrụ n'April 21, 1993, na Washington, D.C.
